data.eml:eml: A new blind groundwater-dwelling genus of the Cladocera (Crustacea: Branchiopoda) from the Korean Peninsula

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jeong, Hyun Gi, Sinev, Artem Y., Brancelj, Anton, Chang, Kwang-Hyeon, Kotov, Alexey A. (2017): A new blind groundwater-dwelling genus of the Cladocera (Crustacea: Branchiopoda) from the Korean Peninsula. Zootaxa 4341 (4): 451-474, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4341.4.1
